com.google.android.drdat.cl.DrdatTasklist

DrdatTasklist Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Content provider that wraps DrdatSmi2TaskList so DrdatGUI can get tasks and schedules.

Only the query method is implemented as the data is read only.

Author:
cal

Override Cursor query ( Uri  uri,

)

Gets a list of tasks for a participant with schedule data.

This uses DrdatSmi2TaskList to manage task / schedule data. If the projection requests a "tasklist" the drdat_tasks table is queried and if not then drdat_studies is queried instead.

See also:
android.content.ContentProvider.query(android.net.Uri, java.lang.String[], java.lang.String, java.lang.String[], java.lang.String)
Parameters:
uri - uri we were called with
projection - if the first element is "tasklist" return a list of tasks otherwise return study info
selection - sql where clause (not used)
selectionArgs - contains the email, passwordMD5 we want
sortOrder - order by clause (not used)
Returns:
cursor with the task / schedule data for this participant

ContentValues  values,
